attributes.action: Investigate whether the BBC NEWS has a unofficial political censorship policy.
attributes.additional_details: I am sure I am not the only when to notice the high number of "transmission faults" such as dips in volumes. I am sure the BBC licence fee payers are intelligent enough to make up their own mind without the leftwing wing BBC trying to influence them. WE are afterall their paymasters. I feel it would be no use complaining to the BBC Trust as it is well it is politicclay bias.
